column3: â€œBought this from Nature's Wonder, and it was marked as 25.4% THC.  N.W. rarely puts % on any of their flowers, so I got some and, DAMN!  I took 2 hits off the pipe and almost immediately felt the effects.  Pain gone, able to do the work that needs doing.  Pleasant mood, no paranoia, no couch-lock.  Be careful with this if you are new to MM, it could be a little much.â€

â€œMy brother and I both use this strain to medicate for a number of medical conditions. I suffer from debilitating migraines, anxiety, and depression. My brother has a traumatic brain injury and epilepsy, which causes him to have severe nausea and loss of appetite. Mother's Helper is both of our go to strain for daytime use. It relieves the pain from my migraines and eases the nausea caused by them, as well as helping ...â€

â€œI officially love this strain...,super uplifting.  You cannot stop smiling.  It's almost physically impossible.  No trouble focusing and the mundane things seem interesting.  If you're into anything comic, this would be a good time to focus your attention on anything humorous offered up by whatever media you prefer.  This strain is an extreme mood shifter.  You can go from from feeling blah to super euphoria with a f...â€

â€œMh is one of my new favorite strains. The combination of polar opposite genetics in crossing chocolope with Northern Lights #5 is PERFECT!! The plant also contains extremely high levels of CBG which is great for any patients suffering from aniexity and depression. Mh is truly a perfect 50/50 that definitely gives you the best of both world effects leaving you very happy and extremely energetic. Arizona Organix is my ...â€
â€œGreat strain , smelled strong , filled the room lovely taste. Would grow this plant to make my house smell beautiful all day.â€
â€œGrand mothers helper lifts this 4-decade cannibus consumer out of the chair and in to action!!Focused,relaxed motivation!Pain and anxiety melts away to calm ,uplifted chi energy!BLISS!â€
â€œWoke up with a headache and after 5 minutes using my Pax I felt better. Headache gone, feel energetic and want to clean my house! Love itâ€
â€œThis I a MUST get for me anytime it's available. Gives me plenty of energy but also a sense of calmness, plus it tastes great. My favorite pre-work strain. Definitely a top 5 favorite for me!â€

â€œOnly recently started smoking and the cannabis shop I visited gave me one joint of this free for being a new customer. The smell was sweet and earthy and the taste was smooth and pleasant. Left me feeling relaxed with a light haze but still attentive, even at 10pm. The come down was smooth without any hard crash, leaving me in a state to peacefully go to sleep and wake up refreshed the next morning.â€
â€œLove this strain! Would recommend to anyone with pain, headaches, or fatigue to help get you through your typical day feeling great.â€
â€œA great value strain. Very nice taste & aroma. I use it as a daytime medication. I  can still function & seem focused with tasks at hand. I'll definitely use this strain again.â€

â€œIncredible !!!! Very uplifting and creative strain!!! I've tried hundreds of strains and this is my favorite!

Well Done... And that ah boy Clark!â€

â€œI have a rare condition called gastroparesis that causes debilitating nausea on a daily basis. I also have alot of anxiety, and this strain helped me with both, were it used recreationally, not my first choice, but not my last either. Definitely at the top. This one can be more expensive, but at Natures AZ Meds in Phoenix, has it priced right.â€
â€œhands down favorite for anxiety and fibromyalgia. I couldn't get by without it.â€
â€œThis is one of my favourite strains. This is my early morning and afternoon go to strain for keeping productive and dealing with pain and lack of energy. Definitely would recommend.â€

â€œAmazing strain for a wake and bake. Smokes nice, smooth, should have no harsh after taste. For me since it isn't so harsh I can't place the taste as well but piney, with no harshness I would say (my tastebuds aren't the best though). Studying chemistry today, so, gave me a nice focus to power through, so, I can enjoy the rest of this lovely saturday. Definitely a re buy; I do want to try glad max, which, is supposed ...â€

â€œIncredible !!!! Very uplifting and creative strain!!! I've tried hundreds of strains and this is my favorite!

Well Done... And that ah boy Clark!â€
â€œThis is one of my favourite strains. This is my early morning and afternoon go to strain for keeping productive and dealing with pain and lack of energy. Definitely would recommend.â€

â€œI asked my bud tender what a good day time strain would be. He made a suggestion that I should try mothers helper. Needless to say I took him up on his suggestion. I couldn't agree more with what he had told me. Great Great overall strain and helps ease my pain, stress, anxiety, inflammation, ect. This strain does not make you tired and leaves your head very clear. Would not recommend before bed however, this is a wo...â€

â€œThe name is perfect!

Fantastic strain with an earthy citrus scent that tingles the nose. Uplifting qualities make it easy to take a hit and get to work. Super energizing, offers a focus like no other (no tunnel vision). Combined with an indica's relaxation effects Mothers Helper truly is a gift from the Gods to on-the-go moms everywhere. Highly recommended for those who like a productive high. 

I took three hits an...â€
â€œLoved this strain, it made me energetic and happy. Took away my headache and gave me the morning boost I needed to get goingâ€

â€œI am a super fan of Mother's Helper.  I kinda went long on the strain and switched to Moby Dick which is good but it's not Mother's Helper.  Anyway, I didn't think there could be another strain that could trump Mother's helper.

Glad Max is that strain.  

Glad Max is almost a back-cross since Chocolope is crossed with Northern Light's #5 to make MH and Glad Max is Mother's Helper crossed with Chocolope again!  I am ...â€
â€œexcellent sativa high for about 2 hours for someone that smokes about a gram a day, and then it mellows down into a moderate indica body buzz until it wears off.â€
â€œThis strain never fails me! Always a good long lasting high and I feel the relief for all my aches and pain. Great strain for cramps and nausea too ladies ;)â€

â€œThis takes my pain down significantly and gives great focus to get stuff done.  Many strains close to numbers leave me 'stoned' but that is not the case for me with this strain.  Hands down favorite for day time.â€
â€œThis strain never fails me! Always a good long lasting high and I feel the relief for all my aches and pain. Great strain for cramps and nausea too ladies ;)â€

â€œMothers is for sure my go to.  Always consistent, and seems to be the perfect sativa dominant blend for me.  Im not a huge sativa fan, but this one is phenomenal.  It comes on subtle, and then next thing you know your in a perfect spot.  Great for dealing with pain during the day.â€

â€œMothers helper was my first Vapor cartridge use. Its now a sought after favorite. 
Its heavy sativa bent was shockingly wonderful. It helped with pain and other issues phenomenally, for the first time in my 15 year chronic pain odessy my pain and depression so well i was fighting adhd again. The one negative that i  found was that i needed to balance all that energy with indica to keep from over doing it.â€

â€œFirst, this stuff smells absolutely delicious.  I find myself just grabbing it to smell because it's so good. Second, I have anxiety and depression every once in a while.  This makes everything go away and puts me in an amazing place.  This is my new go to since I can get through the day and still function normally while having it make any and all anxiety or depression disappear.â€
â€œMother's Helper is my morning go to strain. Perfect for the morning, keeps you energized and focused while still providing all the beneficial health aspects that a pure sativa offers.â€
â€œI really enjoy the effects of this strain. It helps me through my day and keeps me feeling good.â€

â€œMother's Helper is my one true go-to morning strain. It keeps me wide awake while still providing relief to my headaches and knee pain. I would highly recommend this to any patient who needs a strong sativa.â€

â€œMother's Helper is one of the more uplifting and positive strains that I have ever sampled. It provides a heady and active atmosphere that is tethered to the Earth in a way that allows for focus and presence. The Chocolope adds a spaciness that is perfectly counterbalanced by the a Northern Lights' cool relaxation. Truly a pleasure to experience. Would definitely recommend.â€

â€œsooo good!!! really great for getting you into a good mood, getting you ready to get things done. its got that perfect balance of uplifted, happy, energetic w/o being too much. taste is pretty damn earthy, a little bit of citrus; but the smell is heavy citrus. its like pine-sol or something.â€
â€œawesome. never disappoints.â€

â€œA decent, uplifting high. Not extremely potent.  Could be the grow, but not hugely covered in trichs. A nice mellow onset that more or less stays consistent throughout the entire high. This lasted just under 2 hours. I will try this again at some point if it comes back around.â€

â€œAs a new patient, I found that whatever I went home with on day one was great, but I seriously wanted to eat the world. Marijuana and not being munchy seem like a oxymoron to me.....but after trying Mother's Helper.....love the name, perfect! The high is not long lived, but I am not tired and able to maintain my necessary levels of energy and activityâ€

â€œThis mother f-r helped soooo much. Let me shortly explain. These last couple of weeks have been a schooch stressful blah blah blah nobody cares I get it. However, this was the perfect medicine. Perfection"

column1: This mother helped with not only stress and anxiety
column2: but gives the most uplifting and positive experience. It was really a life saver and now I'm ready to turn in and sleep like a baby and dream of natures candy....â€"

column3: â€œLove it for day timeâ€¦..zipping around getting my chores done. It's just hard to believe the genetics! Chocolope x  (sativa) knocks me out for sleep in just minutes and Northern lights is about average for me.â€
â€œMother's Helper, no way! I was couch locked within minutes. The taste was clean and smooth. The high on the other hand put me to sleep. I have a high tolerance and thus stuff put me out.â€

â€œThis is a very good day time Med. I got relief from the blues, and some lower back pain, yet could still function around the house. I am not well traveled in the many strains/names, but this will be a repeat buy for me. There is only one other sativa i would consider. No headache or collapse with this one. _ Dustyâ€
â€œReally nice all around for a high potency. Very happy high.â€
â€œHas that northern light lemon kick mixed with that sativa buzz, great new strain with a touch of purple leavesâ€

â€œLove it for day timeâ€¦..zipping around getting my chores done. It's just hard to believe the genetics! Chocolope x  (sativa) knocks me out for sleep in just minutes and Northern lights is about average for me.â€

â€œGreat strain. Gives me the boost of energy to get things done. Great pain reliever, I have nerve, joint, muscle, and all sorts of other pain, and this helps better than any pills. You can't fully focus on reading, so do not plan on sitting still.  This strain is great for cleaning the house, that's what I mostly use it.â€

â€œMother's Helper is one of the more uplifting strains that I have ever sampled. It generates an active and heady atmosphere while keeping one tethered to the ground in a way that allows for presence and focus. The spacy and light Chocolope is juxtaposed with the coolly anchored Northern Lights to foster an ideal balance of both. I would definitely purchase this strain again. The phenomenal smell and taste are a welcom...â€
â€œTaste like chocolate sweet grapefruit with some peppery spice. Nice smoke and chill happy buzz, not too heavy of a high but it has some kick. The taste is really nice.â€

â€œAs a noob, I'm still in search of the perfect strain to cure what ails me. Mother's Helper did the trick. My pain was completely gone for 2 -3 hours, and I was able to function at a much higher level than other strains have let me. Warm fuzzy feelings.â€
â€œI like this strain a lot, it is very flavorful and potent. Great for creativity.â€
â€œGreat strain for when you need to get things doneâ€
â€œGood for daytime, pretty mild.â€
â€œLoved the happy and energetic feeling this medication providedâ€
â€œMy new fav! Love everything about it!â€
â€œDefinitely hits pretty hard, and is good for relaxing with friends. Doesn't last very long though, maybe about an hour before I'm packing another bowl.â€
â€œSoooo good! Makes me feel fuzzy and happy and so appreciative of life. Definitely puts you to sleep right when you're coming down. 5 out of 5, def, would smoke again. :3â€
â€œI bought a preroll of a sativa phenotype.  It was good, but not great. It tastes great though.â€

â€œI would give this 4.5 stars if possible but not so much 5. Affects are really good, a little more focused I think. In and Ex hale are smooth, skunky'ish, good flavor. No issues about doing it right before bed, nice peaceful sleep. 
Munchie level - This definitely is an Ice Cream and Cookies and Milk kind of after effect.â€
â€œSo sweet tasting. Excellent high I have to say...Northern Lights Ã— Chocolope.â€

â€œDefinitely not a bad hybrid. I've grown fond of Indicas recently and was recommended this today in AZ. Excellent lift. You can go for a walk or veg out on the couch. Great with friends. Haven't gotten super medicated solo on this yet... So far so good!â€
â€œuplifting haze that kept my mind clear as I got some work done. very aromatic as well!â€
â€œLoved this strain. I used it for the daytime and it left me feeling very happy and uplifted! Would highly recommend as a Sativa.â€
â€œLove the smell. The buds are very nice. The effects were I was able to clean my house, car, and cook and read a book. I would highly recommend for the busy smoker.â€

â€œBy far my favorite strain for getting stuff done, being creative, and staying positive while also knocking out pain. I can hardly ever find t in the Phoenix area, which is such a bummer. Great strain for those of us that are sensitive to the more energetic strains- I donâ€™t get anxious with this one.â€
â€œwishing I could find this strain in Washington , cause it's amazingâ€

â€œThis was a GREAT strain for me... it helped in many ways... I took advantage of the double points @ Emerald Palace, and am still enjoying this strain... MOTHER'S HELPER... What a combination... :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-) :-)â€
â€œUplifting and happy, felt very focused. Good daytime strainâ€
â€œgood. doesn't make you hungry. great preworkout green. energetic. happy mood motivator its great gives you lots of feelings of confidenceâ€

â€œI love this strain. Nice flavor, smooth smoke. I smoked at about noon and stayed pleasantly buoyant yet productive and focused until about 2:30. 5/5 would buy again, 5/5 would recommend for occasional patients and the experienced alike.â€
â€œi love the melow but powerful high. no pain. new fav stainâ€
â€œGood strain to smoke when you have a big to-do list that day.â€
â€œMy go to for taking care of house business. Clearheaded, creative, mellow and motivating.â€

â€œMother's Helper, no way! I was couch locked within minutes. The taste was clean and smooth. The high on the other hand put me to sleep. I have a high tolerance and thus stuff put me out.â€

â€œMother's Helper is a fantastic strain that helps me with daytime pain, plus it has a very focused effect. I found it at Monarch Wellness in Scottsdale about a year ago and it has gotten better with every harvest it seems!  I can't get a ton of stuff done with this stuff!   Very task-oriented strain.â€
